basic functions:

{% raw %}

say_sup[source]

say_sup(to)

Say what's up to someone

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_sup('Kona')

"what's up Kona?"
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_sup('kona') == "what's up kona?"
{% endraw %}
